glsa.title: aMule: Parameter injection
glsa.synopsis: An input validation error in aMule enables remote attackers to pass arbitrary parameters to a victim's media player.

background.p: aMule is an eMule-like client for the eD2k and Kademlia networks, supporting multiple platforms.

description.p: Sam Hocevar discovered that the aMule preview function does not properly sanitize file names.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to download a file with a specially crafted file name to inject arbitrary arguments to the victim's video player.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
